value:
$WmMPID_スラシル味方,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|Líf... The Prince Alfonse of this world
is together with his parents. Will that
be an issue?$k$p$nMPID_比翼リーヴ|It has nothing to do with us. Focus
on the mission so we can leave
this place.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|Out of my way. I have a gift to give
my brother.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|We won't be losing this time.
Is everyone ready?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Yes. Let's fight as one, as a family.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|...Yes. While the time is afforded
to us, let us spend it together.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE09_02,0|$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|Oh, well, that's a shame. We lost!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|There is no shame, Henriette. As long
as the people are happy, we have
done our duty.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|You're right. The onlookers seem
to be enjoying themselves! Isn't
that right, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Yes. Though I regret not being able to
win alongside my father and mother,
at least I have this to offer you both...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|Oh, flowers!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|These flowers represent peace,
harmony, and humility...all things
I learned from the both of you.$k$pThose things help me be a better
prince. So please accept these as
a symbol of my gratitude.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|Thank you, Alfonse. You've made
me a very happy mother!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|And for you, Alfonse...
This is from me.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|A gift? From you, Father? They're...
the same flowers I picked!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|Ahaha. Like father like son!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|...Thank you.$k$pThere is still much for me to learn,
but I will continue my studies so I
can be a worthy successor...$k$p$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$Fi500|...Father...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|—fonse! ...Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|...H-huh? Sharena? I was just...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|If you sleep through the whole
festival, you'll miss out on the
fun—and the special outfits!$k$pC'mon! It's time to go to the plaza.
Mother is waiting for us there!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Ah, right... I'll head there now.$k$pEr, what's this?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, wow! What pretty flowers!
Who gave you those?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Father.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|...What?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Sorry. Never mind. Let's go!$k$pI have a feeling Father would be
proud to see us celebrating with
the people of Askr.$k$p$Sbs150|
